ai_summary: Migrate scheduled job commands from .claude/ to .clump/ directory for multi-CLI support
notes:
Changed command storage paths to use .clump/ instead of .claude/ directories:

1. User global commands: ~/.clump/commands/ (was ~/.claude/commands/)
2. Repo-specific commands: {repo}/.clump/commands/ (was {repo}/.claude/commands/)
3. Built-in commands remain in clump's .claude/commands/ as defaults

This change enables scheduled job prompts to work with multiple CLI agents (Claude, Gemini, Codex) instead of being tied to Claude Code's directory structure.
suggested_fix: Update get_user_commands_dir() and get_repo_commands_dir() in backend/app/routers/commands.py to return .clump paths
